title: XRP’s Latest Bullish Trend Meets a Critical Resistance at $0.80
description:
Egrag Crypto pointed out in a recent tweet that the XRP price is facing a major resistance at around $0.80. XRP could now either break through the $0.80 mark, or consolidate, predicted the trader. At press time, XRP was worth about $0.5263 after a 0.30% price increase. In a recent Twitter post, the crypto analyst, […]

The post XRP’s Latest Bullish Trend Meets a Critical Resistance at $0.80 appeared first on Coin Edition.
